attributes.action: stop the attempts to play Premier League games outsidide of England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The heart and soul of football has already been changed over the past 15 
years by Sky, all seater stadiums and the such like.

Now we have all 20 clubs agreeing to look at the proposals to play Premier League games outside of England

Football is supposed to for the fans and the people of this country not for 
the benefit of the clubs and pure money.

we call upon the prime minister and secretary of state for Culture to call upon the Premier League to stop this for the benefit of the country.

We must keep football alive and vibrant within the UK

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
